thread.section_title: Enlightium Academy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enlightium Academy | enlightiumacademy.com
thread.title: Lisa Jo Garza
thread.title_full: Enlightium Academy reviewed by Lisa Jo Garza

author: Lisa Jo Garza
title: Lisa Jo Garza
text:
Illness changed my daughters life that had us make difficult decision in her that would matter in her tomorrow. As parents we want the best and we tried other schools but my daughter was not in their interest academically.
Here at Enlighthened they care and have cared. Her assigned counselor is and has been amazing...working with me as a parent and helping my daughter gain the education she needs to meet her goals. My daughter's teachers were always responded to emails promptly and gave her assistance in what she needed.
I recommend this school over and over again.
Thank you Enlighthened!
